basics.name: Nikhil Venkatraman
basics.label: Engineering Manager • UI Platform & Design Systems

summary: Engineering manager and design systems leader with 10+ years building and scaling enterprise SaaS. Led UI platform modernization and global design system adoption to deliver unified, accessible user experiences; partnered with product/design to accelerate delivery, cut costs, and improve global adoption.

positions.title: Engineering Manager, UI Platform & Design Systems
highlights: Lead a team of 16 engineers (including 1 EM) across 4 teams for Okta’s UI platform and Odyssey design system.
Delivered GA launch of unified navigation across Okta’s apps, streamlining workflows and reinforcing brand coherence.
Drove Odyssey design system adoption (React, design tokens, a11y primitives) across dozens of product teams.
Aligned platform strategy with product needs in partnership with Design, PM, and Accessibility to ensure scalable, inclusive UX.
Built a platform-first culture that reduced duplication, improved accessibility compliance, and strengthened global adoption.

positions.title: Principal Software Engineer / Tech Lead, Globalization-Core
highlights: Led cross-functional engineering to internationalize end-user and admin platforms, enabling 26+ languages worldwide.
Defined i18n architectural strategy/frameworks used across products, reducing localization cycle time and improving release velocity.
Mentored engineers; hosted bi-weekly office hours to share best practices.
Partnered with PM and Design on roadmap planning and delivery.

positions.title: Staff Software Engineer, UI-Core
highlights: Introduced localization tooling and infrastructure for the Identity Engine, improving developer efficiency and translation quality.
Directed initiative to localize the Okta Admin Portal for global markets.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer, End User & Identity Experience
highlights: Co-led redesign/implementation of the Okta sign-in experience using the Identity Engine, improving security and usability.
Built admin customization for email templates and end-user experiences.
Delivered core internationalization capabilities for the end-user application.

positions.title: Software UI Engineer
highlights: Re-architected and redesigned Jobvite Dashboard; improved performance by ~50%.
Built reusable AngularJS UI components to accelerate multi-team development.
Contributed as full‑stack engineer on multiple SaaS features.
Supported internationalization of Jobvite Hire to expand product reach.

positions.title: Front-End Web Developer
highlights: Developed cross-platform web applications and MMORPG portals for global users.

positions.title: Junior Software Developer
highlights: Built e-commerce web applications using Magento and PHP.
